ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | grpss.g | |- G = { <. ( Base ` ndx ) , B >. , <. ( +g ` ndx ) , .+ >. } |
| 2 |  | grpss.r | |- R e. _V |
| 3 |  | grpss.s | |- G C_ R |
| 4 |  | grpss.f | |- Fun R |
| 5 |  | #P_baseid | |- Base = Slot ( Base ` ndx ) |
| 6 |  | #P_opex | |- <. ( Base ` ndx ) , B >. e. _V |
| 7 | 6 | #P_prid1 | |- <. ( Base ` ndx ) , B >. e. { <. ( Base ` ndx ) , B >. , <. ( +g ` ndx ) , .+ >. } |
| 8 | 7, 1 | #P_eleqtrri | |- <. ( Base ` ndx ) , B >. e. G |
| 9 | 2, 4, 3, 5, 8 | #P_strss | |- ( Base ` R ) = ( Base ` G ) |
| 10 |  | #P_plusgid | |- +g = Slot ( +g ` ndx ) |
| 11 |  | #P_opex | |- <. ( +g ` ndx ) , .+ >. e. _V |
| 12 | 11 | #P_prid2 | |- <. ( +g ` ndx ) , .+ >. e. { <. ( Base ` ndx ) , B >. , <. ( +g ` ndx ) , .+ >. } |
| 13 | 12, 1 | #P_eleqtrri | |- <. ( +g ` ndx ) , .+ >. e. G |
| 14 | 2, 4, 3, 10, 13 | #P_strss | |- ( +g ` R ) = ( +g ` G ) |
| 15 | 9, 14 | #P_grpprop | |- ( R e. Grp <-> G e. Grp ) |
| 16 | 15 | #P_bicomi | |- ( G e. Grp <-> R e. Grp ) |
